translations.translation: except for him who is to roast in the Blazing Fire.
Except one who is (destined) to burn in Hell.
except him who shall roast in the Blazing Fire.
except those who are doomed to enter hell.
Except the one who will go into the blazing fire.
Except those who are predestined to burn in Hell!
Save him who will go to hell.
except him who shall roast in Hell.
Save him who is to burn in hell.
except those who will burn in Hell.
Save him Who is to roast in the Flaming Fire.
except someone who is bound for hell.
Except such as are (themselves) going to the blazing Fire!
Except those who are predestined to burn in Hell!
except for he who shall roast in Hell.
Except for he who will be roasting in Hell.
Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
[37:163]   except him who will burn in Hell, in God’s knowledge, exalted be He.
(Save him who is to burn in hell) save him who will enter hell with you, i.e. Iblis; it is also said that this means: except he whom I decreed that he will enter hell with you.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِلاَّ مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ } [الصافات: 163] أي: الذين حقَّ عليهم القول وجرى عليهم حكمه سبحانه، ومضى قضاؤه بأنهم من أصحاب النار وأهل الجحيم، لا بدَّ لهم أن يصلوها ويدخلوها بلا تردد وتخلف؛ يعني: ما يفيد إضلالكم وإغراؤكم إلا لهؤلاء المحكومين بالنار في أزل الآزال دون المجبولين على فطرة الإسلام والتوحيد
